abstract: Apple posted a video of a tribute to Steven P. Jobs, the company's co-founder, that took place last week at the company's campus in Cupertino, Calif.
snippet: Apple posted a video of a tribute to Steven P. Jobs, the company's co-founder, that took place last week at the company's campus in Cupertino, Calif.
lead_paragraph: Apple has posted a video of a tribute to Steven P. Jobs, the company's co-founder, that took place last week at the Apple campus in Cupertino, Calif. (The video must be viewed in the Safari Web browser.)

headline.main: Apple Posts Video From Steve Jobs Tribute
